description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中国人民解放军南部战区政治委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army (PLA) and a politician of the People's Republic of China. He is the current Political Commissar of the Southern Theater Command of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: General (Shang Jiang) of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会解放军和武警部队代表团

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会解放军和武警部队代表团
en: Delegation of the People's Liberation Army and People's Armed Police Force to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的组成部分，由中国人民解放军和中国人民武装警察部队的代表组成。
description.en: A component of the National People's Congress, composed of delegates from the People's Liberation Army and the People's Armed Police Force.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区
en: Southern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五个战区之一。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一个已撤销的集团军。
description.en: A disbanded group army of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十集团军
en: 80th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的集团军之一，前身为第26集团军。
description.en: One of the group armies of the PLA Ground Force, formerly the 26th Group Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十七集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十七集团军
en: 27th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一个已撤销的集团军。
description.en: A disbanded group army of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军
en: 72nd Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的集团军之一。
description.en: One of the group armies of the PLA Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要作战力量。
description.en: The main combat force of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中央军委联勤保障部队

zh-cn: 中央军委联勤保障部队
en: Joint Logistic Support Force of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会直属的后勤保障部队。
description.en: The logistic support force directly under the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军委联勤保障部队政治委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, former Political Commissar of the Joint Logistic Support Force of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，中央军委联勤保障部队政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, Political Commissar of the Joint Logistic Support Force of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任南部战区政治委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, former Political Commissar of the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省武汉市的市辖区。
description.en: A district of Wuhan City, Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 王文全籍贯为湖北新洲。
description.en: Wang Wenquan's ancestral home is Xinzhou, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 2023年12月晋升上将军衔。
description.en: Promoted to the rank of General in December 2023.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，王文全被选为解放军和武警部队出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Wang Wenquan was elected as a delegate of the PLA and PAP to the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会解放军和武警部队代表团
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任第20集团军高炮旅政委、装甲旅政委，第20集团军政治部副主任。
description.en: Formerly served as Political Commissar of the Anti-Aircraft Artillery Brigade, Political Commissar of the Armored Brigade, and Deputy Director of the Political Department of the 20th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十集团军

description.zh-cn: 2013年7月任陆军第26集团军（后为第80集团军）政治部主任。
description.en: Appointed Director of the Political Department of the 26th Group Army (later the 80th Group Army) in July 2013.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十七集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第七十二集团军
中央军委联勤保障部队
中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 王文全接替徐忠波出任中国人民解放军联勤保障部队政治委员。
description.en: Wang Wenquan succeeded Xu Zhongbo as the Political Commissar of the PLA Joint Logistic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 高大光接替王文全出任中国人民解放军联勤保障部队政治委员。
description.en: Gao Daguang succeeded Wang Wenquan as the Political Commissar of the PLA Joint Logistic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 王文全接替王建武出任中国人民解放军南部战区政治委员。
description.en: Wang Wenquan succeeded Wang Jianwu as the Political Commissar of the PLA Southern Theater Command.
